DOC.brief_summary: Phase IIB study find optimal dose rate range propofol maintain minimal-to-moderate sedation diagnostic gastrointestinal endoscopy gastrointestinal polypectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Dose Rate Range Finding Study Propofol minimal-to Moderate Sedation Upper & Lower Endoscopic Tests
DOC.criteria: Male female ( female child bear potential confirm pregnant via test contraception ) Be undergo nonemergent esophagogastroduodenoscopy ( EGD ) colonoscopy , include polypectomy shall complete within 1 hour American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) grade III , IV V VI Baseline oxygen saturation < 90 % ( room air ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > =35
